alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 26 at 10:57AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Michigan, including the following county, Ottawa. * WHEN...Through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Localized flooding of low lying areas and property along the Grand River will be possible. Rapid water level fluctuations may occur due to heavy ice cover on the river and possible ice jam formation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Water levels remain high across the area, and therefore ice jams are still possible. The threat of ice jams will begin to diminish once the river starts falling. That is expected to happen by later Sunday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
